t: Amazon Karigar | Sell your handcrafted prodcucts on Amazon
s: Amazon Karigar is an Amazon initiative to bring to the fore India's rich handicrafts heritage sourced locally from across the country. A program to enable artisans and sellers crafting authentic handmade products to become successful on Amazon.

t: Amazon launched a program for Indian handicrafts. Local artisans say it’s not working
s: December 6, 2024 - Amazon launched its Karigar program in 2017 to promote Indian handicrafts, but Kutch artisans say its mass-market approach undervalues their goods.
